sourcesContent:
<script>
const NotFound = {
  head: {
    title: 'Not Found'
  },
  render(h) {
    return h('div', { style: { margin: '2rem' } }, [
      h('h1', { style: { margin: '0 0 20px 0' } }, ['Not Found']),
      h('saber-link', {
        attrs: {
          to: '/'
        },
        style: {
          fontSize: '16px'
        }
      }, ['← Back Home'])
    ])
  }
}

export default {
  functional: true,
  inject: ['layouts'],
  render(h, { injections: { layouts } }) {
    return h(layouts['404'] || NotFound)
  }
}
</script>

export default component.exports

module.exports = __webpack_public_path__ + "images/icon-code-fork-light.3abaa4e9.svg";
